accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The Solana System program. Used to allocate space on-chain for the randomness_request account.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: The Solana Token program. Used to transfer funds to the randomness escrow.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The Solana Associated Token program. Used to create the TokenAccount for the randomness escrow.

docs: Rarity PDA

fields.name: eventPubkey
docs: `Event` PDA public key for direct ref

fields.name: eventNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `EventLink` PDA to the `Event` PDA

fields.name: championsPassPubkey
docs: Ensure a champions pass have been used for `MainCard` access
`champions_pass_asset` PDA public key for direct ref

fields.name: championsPassNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `champions_pass` PDA

fields.name: isConsumed
docs: Prevents the player to claim multiple time the rewards
If this occurs, it should close and refund the creator of the EventLink PDA?

fields.name: isInitialized
docs: Prevent accidental multiple initializations of a PDA

fields.name: fightCardNonce
docs: Represent the current amount of created fight card
On average, a UFC event typically features around 12 to 15 fights
We set it as `u8` because there will be never more than `255` per events in an MMA fight week

fields.name: tournamentType
docs: The type of tournament MainCard, Prelims or Early Prelims

fields.name: startDate
docs: Start date in seconds

fields.name: endDate
docs: End date in seconds

fields.name: rankRewards
docs: Rank rewards for prize distribution

fields.name: rankNonce
docs: Represent the current amount of player

fields.name: randomness
docs: Represent the randomness, will be used to derive child randomness for collecting mystery box

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce of the `event`

fields.name: eventPubkey
docs: Public key of the event account this fight card is part of

fields.name: eventNonceTracker
docs: Nonce of the event PDA this fight card is part of

fields.name: titleFight
docs: Indicates whether this fight is a title fight

fields.name: fighterBlue
docs: Final fight data about the fighter left position
This is None if the fight have not yet finished

fields.name: fighterRed
docs: Final fight data about the fighter right position
This is None if the fight have not yet finished

fields.name: fightDuration
docs: Fight duration in seconds

fields.name: result
docs: Result of the fight

fields.name: winner
docs: Winner of the fight
This is None in case of a draw when fight is finished

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce of the `fight_card`

fields.name: fightCardPubkey
docs: `fight_card` PDA public key for direct ref

fields.name: fightCardNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `FightCardLink` PDA to the `FightCard` PDA

fields.name: fighterUsed
docs: The `Pubkey` of the booster used

fields.name: fighterNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `Fighter` PDA to the `FightCardLink` PDA

fields.name: shieldBoosterUsed
docs: The `Pubkey` of the booster used

fields.name: shieldBoosterNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `Booster` PDA to the `FightCardLink` PDA

fields.name: pointsBoosterUsed
docs: The `Pubkey` of the booster used

fields.name: pointsBoosterNonceTracker
docs: Tracker to link the `Booster` PDA to the `FightCardLink` PDA

fields.name: fighterColorSide
docs: The fighter side chosen by the player `Red Gloves` or `Blue Gloves`

fields.name: isConsumed
docs: Prevents the calculation of points for the same fightCard multiple times
If this occurs, it should close and refund the creator of the fighCardLink PDA?

fields.name: isInitialized
docs: Prevent accidental multiple initializations of a PDA

fields.name: isLocked
docs: is Locked will mean the PDA is in use and cannot be minted or re used

fields.name: isBurned
docs: is Burned will mean the PDA have been used and cannot be minted or re used

fields.name: isMinted
docs: is Minted mean the PDA have been minted

fields.name: owner
docs: owner of the PDA can use it in-game,
on mint the owner is set to None which mean it is not available in the game until re-deposited

fields.name: metadata
docs: The metadata on-chain, which allow dynamic use on our game

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce of the `mintable_game_asset`

fields.name: mintableGameAssetPubkey
docs: `Pubkey` of the mintable_game_asset

fields.name: mintableGameAssetNonceTracker
docs: this is the link to the address of the pda

fields.name: isFree
docs: Checks if a PDA is eligible to update its `mintable_game_asset_nonce`.
The PDA becomes eligible upon minting and withdrawing a `mintable_game_asset`,
which break the link with the last `mintable_game_asset_nonce`.

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce of the `mintable_game_asset_link`

fields.name: nonce
docs: Nonce of the `mystery_box`

fields.name: orderNonce
docs: Represent the nonce of the current amount orders the player have created

fields.name: playerGameAssetLinkNonce
docs: Represent the nonce of the current player game asset link the player have created

fields.name: isInitialized
docs: Prevent accidental multiple initializations of a PDA

fields.name: eventNonce
docs: Represent the current amount of created event

fields.name: mintableGameAssetNonce
docs: Represent the current amount of mintable game asset pack

fields.name: adminPubkey
docs: The authority which are allowed to administrate the contract

fields.name: fighterPackPrice
docs: The price in USD of each NFT fighter pack

fields.name: boosterPrice
docs: The price in USD of each NFT booster

fields.name: fighterPackAmount
docs: The amount of fighters contained on each NFT fighter pack

fields.name: isInitialized
docs: This data prevent re-initialization

fields.name: authorityBump
docs: Authority bump

fields.name: bankBump
docs: Bank bump

fields.name: fighter
docs: Rarity tiers for NFTs fighter with associated stats

fields.name: shieldBooster
docs: Rarity tiers for NFTs booster with associated stats

fields.name: pointsBooster
docs: Rarity tiers for NFTs booster with associated stats

fields.name: probabilityTiers
docs: Drop probabilities for each NFTs rarity tier, represented as percentage

fields.name: isInitialized
docs: This data prevent re-initialization

types.name: NftMetadata
docs: Metatada Standards copy on-chain

errors.name: InvalidOperation
errors.msg: Custom error message for an invalid operation

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized access attempt

errors.name: GameAssetLinkNotLinkedToAssetPDA
errors.msg: The mintable game asset link is not properly linked to the specified mintable game asset PDA

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Already initialized

errors.name: UnsupportedNftType
errors.msg: The provided NFT type is not supported for this operation

errors.name: InvalidPriceFeed
errors.msg: Invalid Price Feed

errors.name: StaleFeed
errors.msg: Feed has not been updated in 5 minutes

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds

errors.name: InsufficientAmount
errors.msg: Insufficient amount in purchase request

errors.name: RandomnessUnavailable
errors.msg: Randomness unavailable for now

errors.name: NoMatchingRarityFound
errors.msg: No matching rarity found

errors.name: WrongPlayerGameAssetLinkNonce
errors.msg: The nonce must not exceed the last known nonce in the player's state

errors.name: NotFreePDA
errors.msg: This player game asset pda is not free

errors.name: NotEnoughAllowance
errors.msg: Not enough allowance to generate mintable game asset

errors.name: EventAlreadyStarted
errors.msg: The event has already started

errors.name: EventStillRunning
errors.msg: The event is still in progress. Please try again after it concludes on approximately

errors.name: RarityAccountRequired
errors.msg: Attach rarity account to this transaction

errors.name: FightCardLinkedToGameAsset
errors.msg: Fight card link already has a game asset, or game asset nonce is missing

errors.name: EventLinkedToGameAsset
errors.msg: Event card link already has a game asset, or game asset nonce is missing

errors.name: BoosterTypeNotFound
errors.msg: Booster type not found

errors.name: NonMainCardEvent
errors.msg: Champion's pass not required for non-main card events

errors.name: MintableAssetHasNoOwner
errors.msg: This mintable game asset has no owner

errors.name: MintableAssetBurned
errors.msg: This mintable game asset is burnt

errors.name: MintableAssetLocked
errors.msg: This mintable game asset is locked

errors.name: MintableAssetMintedAndUnavailable
errors.msg: This mintable game asset has been minted as an NFT and is no longer available for in-game use

errors.name: MintableAssetLinkRequired
errors.msg: This mintable game asset link is missing

errors.name: ProbabilityTierNotFound
errors.msg: The probability tier was not found

errors.name: RankPointsIsNone
errors.msg: Rank point is required

errors.name: RankIsNone
errors.msg: Rank is required

errors.name: ConsumedAlready
errors.msg: The requested operation has already been consumed

errors.name: RandomnessIsNone
errors.msg: Randomness is required to collect your reward. Please request randomness and try again.

errors.name: FailedToParseValue
errors.msg: Failed to parse value

errors.name: MissingChampionsPassAsset
errors.msg: Champion's pass asset is missing

errors.name: MissingChampionsPassLink
errors.msg: Champion's pass link is missing

errors.name: RandomnessAlreadyRevealed
errors.msg: Randomness already revealed

errors.name: RandomnessNotResolved
errors.msg: Randomness is not yet resolved
